features: Fast, regular, bold, or over ice, BrewChoice Plus makes it easy to select your best brew.
Brew Over Ice, an optimized brewing process designed to be brewed over ice and maintain its bold, flavorful taste.
Fast Brew makes it easy to brew 14 cups of carafe coffee up to 20% faster
The 14 cup FlavorCarafe uniquely designed to ensure coffee stays warmer longer while maintaining the coffee’s aromatic flavor.
Low, medium or high, the SteadyTemp Warming Plate lets you set your desired keep warm temperature up to 4 hours.
A sleek and seamless touch display with 24hr timer that places a premium on ease of use.
Easy to view, front level water indicator ensures an accurate fill with every pour.
Our built in brew signal beeps when your coffee is ready to pour.
body.description: Exceptional in every way, the new PureFlavor Coffee Maker is the first-ever 14-cup machine from Braun. Powered by innovative Fast Brew technology, the machine rapidly brews 14-cups of coffee up to 20% faster*. The intuitive display features a touch-screen to select the brewing process. BrewChoice Plus offers four brewing options—fast, regular, bold or over ice; select your coffee of choice and the built-in brewing signal will alert you when it’s ready. Our refined brewing process retains the coffee’s full-bodied aromas even when poured over ice, so no sip ever tastes watered down; The stainless steel accented FlavorCarafe seals in the flavor, minimizing external air exposure to ensure the coffee’s rich, nuanced flavors are part of every cup. Keep your coffee warm for up to 4 hours on the SteadyTemp Warming Plate that lets you specify an ideal temperature – low, medium or high. A fully automatic 24-hour programmable timer means your much-needed first cup of coffee will be waiting for you when you want it. The front view-level water indicator clearly indicates the precise water levels required for every use. Pair that with the built-in charcoal water filter and you can rest assured no impurities will impact the taste of your fresh brew. And thanks to the automated descaling warning, the machine will inform you when its to be cleaned. As for the removable parts, place them in the dishwasher after every use—it’s that easy. The PureFlavor Coffee Maker makes savoring your favorite brew simple. *Compared to the Braun KF7170 on Bold

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PureFlavor Coffee Maker KF5650 Up to 14 cups, just the way you like it. Strong, hot or delightfully over ice – made at home. Introducing the all-new PureFlavor 14-cup Coffee Maker by Braun. Powered by innovative Fast Brew technology, the machine rapidly brews 14-cups of coffee up to 20% faster. *Compared to Braun KF7170 on Bold BrewChoice Plus Brew Over Ice Fast Brew First 14-cup FlavorCarafe SteadyTemp Warm Plate Premium Touch Display Front-View Water Level Indicator Brew End Signal

BrewChoice Plus Choose from four brewing options that best fit your needs: Fast, regular, bold or over ice. Brew Over Ice Optimized brewing process delivering intense coffee flavor that won't taste watered down over ice. Fast Brew 14 cup carafe of coffee up to 20% faster. First Braun 14-cup FlavorCarafe Stainless steel accented, uniquely designed 14-cup carafe ensures coffee stays warmer for longer.

SteadyTemp Warm Plate Select your keep warm temperature low, medium or high for extra hot coffee up to 4 hours. Premium Touch Display Easy to use premium touch display allows intuitive and convenient operation. Front-View Water Level Indicator Provides clear sight to see how much water is in your coffee maker. Brew End Signal Tone to alert you the brewing is complete. Can be silenced with the touch of a button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I Love this 14 cup Braun coffee maker.... Does not leak when you pour 👍 Love the features that are programmable. Easy to follow instructions for setting the clock. Have already been through one cleaning cycle 👍. The best thing about this Braun.... It makes Great coffee 😁.Always read and follow the directions for set up and programs (if you use) . I find that All electronics 🤔 or programs can be frustrating at first... But, if you read and follow their instructions, even if you fail at first.... You can redo it. Except when it's in cleaning mode, have your spare water pitcher handy. Makes it easier to finish the job.I especially love the look and style of the Braun coffee maker. I use the reusable filter it came with and love it. No more paper filters.Most of All 😁 I have extra coffee for my afternoon break 😂 without brewing another pot.Would definitely recommend to anyone and I'll definitely purchase another one in time when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: This coffee maker is wonderful. It's 14 cup capacity,easy to clean and maintain and it's so pretty.UPDATE.... Very disappointed. Machine stopped working after 3 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with the taste and temperature of the coffee from this maker. Not the easiest to program for auto start, not impossible, but some will never figure it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not Great - But Super Cheap
reviews.reviewText: I know it's just coffee, not rocket science. Although it looks great, these controls are all sorts of bad, they wasted no man hours re-thinking the setup sequences. Very poorly thought out, in our high tech digital world no less.To set the automatic brew, which in and of itself is an oxymoron, and for which most makers will tend to be rather self explanatory. Not here; Braun makes you earn that cup-o-jo. It's not a - once and you're good until the next power outage resets it to default, oh no, you set this each and every night (or day respectively, whatever you're routine). It's a very odd sequence of pannel inputs, not unlike the kind used on nuclear missile consoles I'm guessing.I don't write bad reviews as a sort of twisted form of relaxation; I knew this was a cheap deal when I ordered it. I "rolled the old dice." I now look forward to its end-of-life (or scheduled obsolescence) so I can drop some coin on my go-to brand. It has one big knob you turn and set everything, including your water's hardness. Now that is progress. Braun can't do that?Oh, you're curious "how does the coffee taste?" ... like everyday, ordinary coffee, no frills... this maker will not "wow" you.So, if you're short on cash, need a coffee maker for guests, or your office, you're not picky, you don't touch the stuff, or just like a routine evening's coordination challenge of setting the auto brew (all but automatic), this baby is for you!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: It replaced her Mr. coffee coffee maker, that was similar to this one, but we could not find a good replacement in their brand. So we went to Amazon, and although Brian usually makes razors and thermostats, and such, we were pleasantly surprised to find his coffee maker, to which we Had put to the test at least two pots a day we’ve done the ice iced coffee pour over ordered the new charcoal filters totally impressed with this coffee maker, especially for the price will be buying again in the future. Their products, especially coffee makers will upload a picture when I get home .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It wrks great and keeps coffee hot for 4 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This coffee pot makes the hottest coffee!! Looks great, works great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars tough to program....taste is good.
reviews.reviewText: I need to use a cone filter or else the grinds end up in the coffee. I just descaled but the instructions are terrible. This should be easy to descale! To program is tough also. Takes a while to auto setup for the morning.
Easy to use, it makes excellent coffee.

The only issue I have with this coffee machine is that the top of the coffee pot is loose and when cleaning it the top will fall off. This is a good size coffee machine that requires a bit of counter space, otherwise it is a beautiful coffee machine, the coffee tastes great and I love that you can change and adjust the time you like the hot plate to stay on to keep your coffee warm. You can also adjust the temperature of the coffee itself. This machine is very nice. I am very glad I purchased this coffee machine.
Thank you for this perfect and useful coffee machine . After that , I alway make my coffee at home 😌

reviews.reviewTitle: Uber dissapointed - major Braun fan for decades...no more
reviews.reviewText: Within 4 months of use this machine would turn off after brewing coffee leaving a pot of lukewarm brew...I have had at least 4 coffee machines in 40 years - all braun - all amazing - this was a disaster...too late to return but buyer beware...no longer lives up to the legacy of a premium brand...if I had the time (like anyone has time anymore) to deal with this and the manufacturer I would...its a write-off and lesson learned. Id say it works great when it works and the coffee is just as good as it has always been over the course of my being loyal Braun clientele...but this one was a dud and Ive paid for something that is just not up to snuff...save yourself the headache and move on from Braun..(sad face)

I have owned many automatic drip coffee makers over the years, and they all seemed to have some draw backs. My first coffee maker (many decades ago) was a Braun - remember the white one with only one button, the On/Off switch? Since then I’ve had mainly Cuisinart or similar brands. I found them difficult to fill, with timers/clocks that were almost impossible to read. So when I went looking for a new coffee maker I thought I would go back to Braun. And I am so glad I did.This unit looks great, is easy to fill, has a clock that is lighted and easily visible, and it makes great coffee! The pot is perfect too - hinged lid, and pours beautifully. No splashing or dribbling like most glass coffee pots I’ve used.While the settings are a little tricky at first, once the temperature and time are set, it’s easy from there. Power button, brew level (Fast, Regular or Strong) and you’re all set.I would definitely buy another one of these, and I’m looking forward to many years of great morning coffee with this one.
